pageContext.claim: “Who are the four prosecutors (Mueller people?) who cut and ran after being exposed for recommending a ridiculous 9 year prison sentence to a man that got caught up in an investigation that was illegal, the Mueller Scam, and shouldn't ever even have started? 13 Angry Democrats?”
pageContext.analysis: All wrong. Only two of the prosecutors worked for special counsel Robert Mueller. The sentencing recommendation was a public filing to a court; it wasn't "exposed." Multiple courts ruled the Mueller investigation, which was authorized by a Trump appointee, was legal. The Department of Justice inspector general found that the Russia investigation was properly started.
